mean_cn: v.忽视，未注意到；眺望，俯视
mean_en: to fail to see or notice something; to see something wrong or bad but decide to ignore it; to not consider somebody for a job or position, even though they might be suitable
sentence: It is easy to overlook Lord Bao in this picture.
sentence_trans: 在这张照片中很容易忽视包大人。
word_etyma: over在上，在外 + look看 → 在上面看 → 俯视；疏忽
